title: Mihaela Raducu - Frontend Developer | CV
ab.name: Name:
ab.para1: With experience in the tech field, particularly in Smart City projects, I have contributed to the development and implementation of innovative solutions with a real impact.
ab.para2: Currently, I am expanding my skills in Web Development through an intensive Front-End JavaScript course, focused on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Responsive Design, and modern frameworks. My goal is to build a solid portfolio and become part of a collaborative development team.
ab.para3: Bringing a structured approach and strong attention to detail from previous roles, I combine these with the creativity and adaptability of web development. In the long term, I aim to grow into a skilled Full-Stack JavaScript Developer and contribute to meaningful, forward-thinking projects.
exp.work3: Managed projects focused on integrating innovative technological solutions into urban planning and sustainable development strategies. The role involved overseeing complex projects, collaborating closely with various stakeholders, and delivering customized Smart City solutions to modernize and optimize urban environments.
exp.work2: Oversaw the development and implementation of European-funded projects, with a strong focus on urban development and sustainability. This role covered the entire funding process, from identifying opportunities and preparing applications to monitoring project execution, ensuring compliance with European standards, and tailoring solutions to client needs.
exp.work1: Developed and implemented European-funded projects, focusing on sustainable development and effective solutions for urban development. This role involved managing the entire process from strategic planning to execution, ensuring compliance with European standards and meeting client-specific requirements.
exp.university: National University of Political Studies and Public Administration
exp.university2: National University of Political Studies and Public Administration
exp.univ3: National University of Political Studies and Public Administration
exp.public: Public Innovation and Smart City Strategies
proj1.para1: This roadmap provides a clear overview of the essential steps to becoming a Frontend Developer. It is a structured guide for those who want to pursue a career in web development but are unsure where to start or how to organize their learning path.
proj1.para3: Learn the fundamentals: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
proj1.para4: Explore modern frameworks and libraries like React, Vue.js, or Angular
proj1.para5: Practice consistently through personal projects and coding challenges
proj1.para6: Stay up to date with industry trends and continue learning
proj1.para7: Build a portfolio that showcases your skills
proj1.para8: Connect with the developer and tech community
proj1.para9: For a more detailed overview, including the full design and useful resources, feel free to check out the LinkedIn post: View the post on LinkedIn
proj2.title: My CV
proj2.para1: My online CV, built as a single-page application to present my projects, skills, and frontend development journey.
proj2.para2: Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on responsive structure, clarity, and user accessibility.
proj2.para3: The project also integrates Bootstrap for layout flexibility and Webpack for asset management and build optimization.
proj3.title: One-Pager
proj3.para1: This is a one-page website built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, designed to showcase a responsive layout. The project includes a custom logo, a full-screen video banner, animated elements using AOS, and a dark mode toggle.
proj3.para3: Responsive layout with Bootstrap grid system
proj3.para5: Full-width background video in the hero section
proj3.para7: Section-based smooth navigation and sticky header
proj3.para9: Contact form and embedded Google Maps
proj3.para10: Modular structure: About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, Contact
proj3.para11: The structure is complete, and visual content (text/images) is still being refined. This is my second full-layout project, focusing on complexity, user experience, and design consistency.
proj3.para12: View the live project
proj4.title: Design Showcase
proj4.para1: This creative mockup was designed to illustrate modern, responsive layouts across various devices. Although not a functional website, it highlights essential design principles such as balance, whitespace, visual hierarchy, and typography.
proj5.title: Frontend Journey
proj5.para1: This visual piece represents a key moment in my early development as a frontend developer. After building my first responsive website using HTML and CSS, I began focusing more deeply on layout structure, design systems, and responsive behavior across devices.
proj5.para2: Although not a functional project, this mockup captures the transition from purely technical implementation to more thoughtful and intentional visual design. It reflects an important phase where I started to connect technical execution with user experience and design clarity.
proj5.para3: This stage marked the beginning of a more strategic approach to how I plan, structure, and present my work.
proj6.title: Responsive Website
proj6.para1: This project represents my first step into frontend development, focusing on building a fully responsive static website using only HTML and CSS. It allowed me to apply core principles of web layout, structure, and responsive design.
proj6.para3: Semantic HTML structure for clarity and accessibility
proj6.para4: CSS styling with a focus on visual hierarchy and layout
proj6.para5: Responsive design using media queries and flexible units
proj6.para6: Layout optimized for multiple device sizes
proj6.para7: This project marked the beginning of my journey into frontend development. It helped me understand how structure and style work together to create accessible and user-friendly experiences across devices.
proj6.para8: View the live project

ct.title: Would you like to collaborate?
ct.inf:
Whether you need help with a frontend project, are building a web development team, or want to implement modern tech solutions,
I am open to collaboration opportunities!
Feel free to fill out the form or send me an email.
I look forward to discussing potential collaborations and contributing together to impactful projects.
